data.title: Maria Aquinar: What you should know about Sebastian Bach's ex-wife
data.meta_description: MARIA AQUINAR is Sebastian Bach's ex-wife. How much do you know about her aside from her previous marriage? Here is everything you need to know about her.
data.text:
Sebastian Bach (Canadian singer and songwriter) achieved mainstream success as the frontman of Skid Row's heavy metal band. He was always seen beside her lovely wife (now separated), Maria Aquinar. The couple used to show up on interviews together and embodied love and a successful relationship in the entertainment industry. However, the two divorced, to the disappointment of fans that vouched for the lovely relationship. Of course, Maria had gained immense fame for being associated with the singer. So, how much do you know about her?

Indeed, it is never easy living in the limelight. The constant follow-up by tabloids and fans is just unbearable. A misstep and you are national news. But entertainers have no choice as it comes with the career. Their spouses, however, are, in most cases, in for a rude shock as they gain popularity fast by association.

For instance, who knew Sebastian Bach's wife before their lovely union? Now, she is national news, people looking for more information about her current state after splitting with her husband. So what is her story, and where is she today?

Maria Aquinar's profile summary

Name: Maria Sandra Muir Aquinar

Date of birth: December 23, 1963

Age: 58 years old as of 2021

Zodiac sign: Capricon

Height: 5 feet 7 inches

Weight: 103 lbs or 47 kg

Body measurement: 35D-24-32 inches

Spouse: Sebastian Bach (1992-2010)

Children: Paris Francis Bach, London Siddhartha Halford Bach, Sebastiana Maria Chantal Bach

Who is Maria Aquinar?

Maria Aquinar is the ex-wife of Canadian singer and songwriter Sebastian Bach. They started dating in the mid-1980s and later married on July 26, 1992.

Maria was born on December 26, 1963. This means that she is 57 years old as of October 2021. There isn't much information about her background, including family and education. However, it is known that she is multiracial. It is safe to assume that she is American, considering her noticeable presence and association with the country.

Although Maria is famous for being the ex-wife of popular Canadian musician Sebastian Bach, she created a pretty excellent reputation in the entertainment industry. However, the exact time of when she started her career in the entertainment industry is unknown.

She is linked to various shows that featured Bach like I Married… and Supergroup. I Married… is a reality television show that aired on VH1 from 2003 to 2005. The TV show chronicled the life of the spouse and family of famous music icons. It has three seasons and were produced as specials with no set time.

Maria Aquinar has also appeared in Supergroup that aired in 2006. The producers placed various rock stars together in a mansion for 12 days, where they had to play live shows together. So, how did Maria gain fame from this show?

She appeared on the fourth episode where she was visiting Sebastian Bach. Tera Patrick, a wife of one of Skid Row's band members, a bass guitarist, also appeared in the episode as a guest.

The former Sebastian Bach's wife gained fame after the TV station aired an episode of a photoshoot session whereby she became intimate with Tera. Her appearance allowed her to grow her modelling career, which she prospers until today.

Sebastian Bach and Maria Aquinar's relationship

Sebastian and Maria started dating way before Sebastian created his band and became famous. They gave birth to their first child, Paris Bierk, on March 4, 1988.

Sebastian eventually married in 1992, four years after the birth of their first child, Paris. After that, on January 17, 1994, Sebastian Bach and Maria Aquinar were blessed with a second child, London Siddartha Halford Bach Bierk. And on July 15, 2007, Maria had her third child, a daughter named Sebastiana Maria Chantal.

So, is Sebastian Bach still married to maria? Unfortunately, their marriage started hitting the rocks in 2010, and they finally divorced in September 2010. The couple had separated two months earlier.

Why did Sebastian and Maria separate?

In an interview with revolver magazine, Sebastian reiterated and confirmed that the internet was the primary culprit of her divorce.

When you go on tour starting in the mid-‘80s, and then someone invents the internet in, like, 1996, you're pretty much fu$%ed. I mean, the sh$t on these websites is the reason my three kids don't have a father right now. You can go online, and there's a c%$k chart where you can check out my rig, and find these chicks typing whatever they want to type.

On top of this, Bach blamed a 2010 book, The Last Living Slut: Born In Iran, Bred Backstage, penned by self-professed groupie named Roxana Shirazi, for his divorce. He states that there are a lot of lies about him in the book when he toured with GUNS N' ROSES in 2006.

You read the book, and it's like, I'm backstage with a case of di$dos that I'm using on all these different women. Dude, can I tell you something? I do not travel on the road with a case of di$dos. That never f%$ing happened. But my ex-wife doesn't give a f$%ck. She's in Barnes & Noble reading this, and that it's like, what are you gonna do? I said to my lawyer, ‘Should I sue?’ And he said, ‘All you are going to do is make the book bigger.’

Quick facts about Maria Aquinar

When did she meet Sebastian Bach? Maria Aquinar met Sebastian Bach before he started his band, Skid Row.

When did Maria marry Sebastian? Maria married Sebastian in 1992. However, there are rumours that they never tied the knot but only did a simple ceremony together.

When did Maria have her first child? She got her first child with Sebastian Bach while they were dating on March 4, 1988.

How did she start modelling? Sebastian Bach from skid row's wife got her modelling breakthrough via a Supergroup reality show.

When did Maria separate from Sebastian? Maria and Sebastian divorced towards the end of 2010.

Where is Maria Aquinar now? She started a journey, taking part in the fitness lifestyle and helping other people to become vegans. She currently lives in New Jersey with her youngest child.

Maria Aquinar is famous for being the ex-wife of renowned singer and songwriter Sebastian Bach. What most people do not know is that the two started dating even before Sebastian gained fame. They were one of the loveliest couples in the entertainment industry but divorced after being together for 22 years.

Did you know that Steve Harvey has an ex-wife? Yes, she's named Mary Harvey, and tuko.co.ke featured an interesting article about her background and current life. But, unfortunately, she disappeared from the limelight after separating from the famous comedian and host.

When did she meet Steve Harvey, and when did they separate? Also, what is she up to today, considering she is no longer popular?

Source: TUKO.co.ke
